599II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h - 2018'08'31 599
wxl 2"144 - 2019 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 04 jeks isl=rdod - 2019'10'04

II fldgi – wêlrK
 msgqj  
iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha oekaùï ... ... ... —

Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï ... 600
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
599 - B 081565 — 353 (2019/10)
D 1 -

Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
 fuu .eiÜ m;%h www.documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka nd.; l< yel' 
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oekaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs 
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2019 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 25 jeks Èk m<lrk 
.eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2019 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 11 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m<l< hq;= njg 
hï mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh 
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2019'10'04

Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
Èid$ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - fudrgqj
ld,h bl=;a jQ kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha we;s ±kg jir mylg fmr wjika ù we;s my; Wmf,aLkfha ±lafjk kvq jd¾;d 2019 foieïn¾ 27 
Èfkka miqj fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQodkï lr we;'
   02' tfyhska fuys my; Wmf,aLkfha ±lafjk kvq iïnkaOfhka hï md¾Yjlrejl= ;udg wjYH kvqfõ iïmQ¾K 
úia;rhla fyda tys hï fldgila ,nd.ekSug wjYH fõ kï" tA i`oyd ,sÅ; b,a,Sula 2019 foieïn¾ 27 jeks Èkg fmr 
fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾ fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;= fõ'
   03' tfia b,a,Sï bÈßm;a fkdjqkfyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2019 foieïn¾ 27 jeks Èfkka miqj 
fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajd isáñ'

uqo,a whlr §u i|yd fld<U jd‚c uydêlrKfha by; wxl ork kvqfjka ud fj; ksl=;a lr we;s úlsŒfï wd{dj m%ldr 
fuys my; i|yka m<uq jk Wmf,aLkfha úia;r fldg we;s bvu yd tA u; msysá .y fld< wd§ ish¨ foa j¾I 2019 la jQ 10

wd×j m%ldrj fuys my; i|yka fojk Wmf,aLkfha úia;r fldg we;s bvu yd tA u; msysá .y fld< wd§ ish¨ foa j¾I 
2019 la jQ 10 jk ui 31 jeks Èk fm'j' 11'00 g tlS foam< msysgd we;s ud,fí" ñys÷ udj;" 13 jk mgqu. hk ia:dkfha § 
o" ud úiska m%isoaO fjkafoaisfha úl=Kkq ,nk nj fuhska m%isoaO fldg m%ldY lrkq ,efí'
fjkafoaisfha § by<u ,xiq ;nkakd .eKqïlre jk w;r" fjkafoaish wjika jQ jydu .eKqïlre úiska" 
 1' uq¿ .eKqï ñf,ka 25] l uqo,la o"
 2' fjkafoais .dia;= yd rcfha .dia;= o"
   úlsŒu wjika jQ jydu uqo,ska ud fj; ^fjkafoaislre& f.úh hq;=h' fplam;a Ndr.kq fkd,efí' .eKqï ñf,ka 
f.jk ,oafoa 25] l uqo,la muKla kï" .eKqï ñf,ka b;sß uqo, jk 75] l uqo, Èk 30 la we;=<; fld<U" jd‚c 
uydêlrKfha by; wxl ork kvqjg ;ekam;a l< hq;= h'
m<uq Wmf,aLkh
niakdysr m<df;a" fld<U Èia;%slalfha" fyajd.ï fldarf<a m,af,a m;a;=fõ ud,fí msysá zzw¨fnda.yj;a;ZZ kue;s bvug 
n,h,;a udkl fla' ã' Ô' ùrisxy uy;d úiska 2006'01'02 jk Èk iy;sl lrk ,o msUqre wxl 3119 ys len,s wxl 01 kej; 
uek idok ,o n,h,;a udkl fla' ã' Ô' ùrisxy uy;df.a 2006'01'22 Èke;s wxl 3128 ork msUqr m%ldrj len,s wxl 07g 
udhsï" W;=rg ( fuu msUqf¾u i|yka len,s wxl 05 iy 06 o" kef.kysrg ( fuu msUqf¾u i|yka len,s wxl 06" 12 iy 08 
o" ol=Kg ( fuu msUqf¾u i|yka len,s wxl 12" 08 iy 02 o" niakdysrg ( 4732 msUqf¾ i|yka len,s wxl 02 iy fuu msUqf¾

msysá .yfld< iy ish¨ foa iuÕ fõ'

.eiÜ m;%h m< lsÍu ms<sn|j jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
i;sm;d uqøKh jk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha  .eiÜ m;%h idudkHfhka  isl=rdod Èkj, m<  lrkq ,efí' 
isl=rdod Èkhla rcfha ksjdvq Èkhla jQ  úg tu isl=rdod  Èkg m%:u jev lrk Èkfha .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,efí'  ta wkqj .eiÜ 
m;%fha  m< lsÍu i|yd  ksfõok Ndr.kakd wka;su  Èkh o tu i;sfha we;sjk  ksjdvq Èk .Kk wkqj fjkia  jkq  we;'
ta ta .eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ±kaùï Ndr .kakd wka;su Èkh iy fõ,djka  my; m< lr we;s Wmf,aLkfha ±lafõ'  
my; i|yka  kshñ;  fõ,djg  miq ,efnk  ish¨u ±kaùï th tjQ wh fj; ;emEf,ka  wdmiq tjkq ,efí'  B<Õ .eiÜ m;%fha  
th m< l< hq;= kï wjYH ixfYdaOkhka lr wdmiq  túh hq;=h' rcfha  uqøKd,h fj; ;eme,a  u.ska tjk ±kaùï  wm%udoj tys 
,eîug iEfyk fõ,djla §  ;eme,a lsÍfuka  jqjukd  .eiÜ m;%hg ±kaùu we;=<;a  fjkjd fuka u th ish¨ fokdf.a u myiqjg 
o fya;= jk nj i<lkak'
